meanings.definition: A substance that is produced by leukocytes.
meanings.sent1: The leukons help fight off infections in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study leukons to understand how the immune system works.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous leukons decided to throw a party in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a wave of leukons, spreading healing throughout the body.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed a bustling city of leukons, each one a tiny hero in the war against illness.

meanings.sent1: Leukons are white blood cells that protect us from germs.
meanings.sent2: When you get sick, your body produces more leukons to fight the infection.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy leukons yawned and stretched, ready for another day of defending the body.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of health, leukons are the brave soldiers standing guard.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the dance of leukons was like a graceful ballet of protection and defense.
